scripts.test:all: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; yarn test:hyva; yarn test:pps; yarn test:pps-checkout; yarn test:admin'
scripts.test:all:ui: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; yarn test:hyva:ui; yarn test:pps:ui; yarn test:pps-checkout:ui; yarn test:admin:ui'
scripts.test:hyva: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 APP_NAME=pps  TEST_BASE=hyva npx playwright test
scripts.test:hyva:ui: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 APP_NAME=pps  TEST_BASE=hyva npx playwright test --ui
scripts.test:pps: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 APP_NAME=pps  TEST_BASE=pps npx playwright test
scripts.test:pps:ui: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 APP_NAME=pps  TEST_BASE=pps npx playwright test --ui
scripts.test:pps-checkout: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 APP_NAME=pps  TEST_BASE=checkout npx playwright test --project=chromium --retries=5 --workers=1
scripts.test:pps-checkout:ui: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 APP_NAME=pps  TEST_BASE=checkout npx playwright test --ui
scripts.test:admin: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 APP_NAME=pps  TEST_BASE=admin npx playwright test --project=chromium --retries=1
scripts.test:admin:ui: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 APP_NAME=pps  TEST_BASE=admin npx playwright test --project=chromium --retries=1 --ui
scripts.test:debug: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 APP_NAME=pps  PWDEBUG=1 npx playwright test
